    • Method Detail

      • getAccumulatorPort

        public int getAccumulatorPort()
        Returns:
        The port the accumulator will listen in for new incoming connections

      • setAccumulatorPort

        public void setAccumulatorPort(int port)
                        throws NTMonConfigException
        Parameters:
        port - The port the accumulator will listen in for new incoming connections. Must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal 65535
        Throws:
        NTMonConfigException - If the port is not within acceptable limits

      • getSocketTimeout

        public int getSocketTimeout()
        Returns:
        How long a socket should wait for an incoming connection in seconds.

      • setSocketTimeout

        public void setSocketTimeout(int time)
                      throws NTMonConfigException
        Parameters:
        time - How long a socket will wait for an incoming connection. Must be greater than 0 so that the process will periodically check for the exit condition.
        Throws:
        NTMonConfigException - If a value less than or equal to 0 was given.

      • getTimeoutTimes

        public int getTimeoutTimes()
        Returns:
        The number of times a connection will timeout before it is marked as disconnected

      • setTimeoutTimes

        public void setTimeoutTimes(int timeoutTimes1)
                     throws NTMonConfigException
        Parameters:
        timeoutTimes1 - The number of times a connection will timeout before it is marked as disconnected
        Throws:
        NTMonConfigException - If a value less than 0 was given
